task.title: How to Study for the LSAT
task.shortdesc: During Spring I will be studying for the LSAT, so you will be too.

taskbody.context: Studying for the LSAT is difficult but it is an important factor in applying to Law School. Test books can be expensive.

step.cmd: Purchase the PowerScore LSAT books on Amazon, as well as the LSAC Practice tests.
Read through the introductory chapters in the trilogy
Repeat steps 1-4 until you have mastered the content.
